game.name: Hydra Castle Labyrinth
game.desc: Hydra Castle Labyrinth is a tribute to platform/metroidvania games from the 16-bit era, inspired by games like La-Mulana and Maze Of Galious. Explore the castle, starting with your sword only, fight eight bosses in their respective dungeons, collect new items and reclaim the crown!
game.developer: Eiji Hashimoto aka Buster, Studio Pixel (port by PtitSeb)
